name: icon-repository-backend
description: Serves icon information to, and accepts updates on icons from, the front-end

scripts.compile: rm -rf build && tsc && cp -r configurations build/ && npm run add-version
scripts.watch:tests: npm run compile && concurrently --kill-others "tsc --watch" "cross-env ICON_REPO_CONFIG_PROFILE=dev nodemon --watch build run-tests.js"
scripts.dev:import: cross-env ICON_REPO_CONFIG_PROFILE=dev cross-env ICON_DATA_CREATE_NEW=always npm run import
scripts.dev: npm run compile && concurrently --kill-others "tsc --watch" "cross-env ICON_REPO_CONFIG_PROFILE=dev nodemon --watch build build/src/app.js"
scripts.dev:oidc: npm run compile && concurrently --kill-others "tsc --watch" "cross-env ICON_REPO_CONFIG_PROFILE=devoidc-wcontext nodemon --watch build build/src/app.js"
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run compile && cross-env ICON_REPO_CONFIG_PROFILE=dev cross-env IGNORE_CONFIG_FILE_CHANGE=true node run-tests.js

author: peter.dunay.kovacs@gmail.com
